subject: RE: Website adjustment for employees
preview: Hi Kasia, Apologies, It is in the main menu, can you please check at your end? In the event it doesn't show, give you cache a refresh.

full_threads.body:
Hi Kasia, 

Apologies, It is in the main menu, can you please check at your end? In the event it doesn't show, give you cache a refresh.
Looks amazing but not visible on iPhone 😭
@ricaV2 looks amazing, thanks!

Hi Kasia, 

Copy that, thanks. 

Absolutely! Can you please check out: https://completeplumbingdrainage.com.au/, scroll to the footer/bottom and let me know what you think?

Logged 5mins to Harvest

@chris please check

https://completeplumbingdrainage.com.au/

5mins madam @ricaV2

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi @ricaV2 can you please assign to the most appropriate team member?

1. Add "person" or user icon to the footer on the Right Hand Side with title "Employees"
2. Centre all three footer elements
3. Link to https://completeplumbingdrainage.com.au/employees/

Screenshot example added.

Please let me know if you need more info!

Hey Chris

Don't worry about the form, if they have issues, they can complete on office computers as a work around.

Happy to go live and tick it off the list.

Are employees only able to access via the URL or can we have something on the homepage they can click to get to the password page?

Really appreciate the teams help with this one.

Kasia

Hey Kasia, 

Some general updates below:

1. We have got the employee details form to a point where it works on Andriod mobiles, not iPhones. From chatting with the devs this could be down to data getting stripped to improve load speeds. 

The next step from here is to re-create the form and turn it into a digital form (rather than PDF). It will allow all previous functions (print and save etc.), as well as allow the employee to sign with a finger on their screen. 

Please let me know if you would like us to work on this and we can get started next week. 

2. The password has been updated to "cpdstaff"

3. Of course, we typically send the invoices out at the beginning of the Month, is that ok with your time-line?
Logged 30mins to Harvest
Madam @ricaV2. 30mins

@ricaV2 @jaime @glen 
Hi team, I just spoke to Jaime about his priorities for the rest of the week. 
Is there any chance Glen can assist with this ticket?
@chris we need more time to fix that. I will need to forward this to Jaime.

@ricaV2 thanks!

I just checked Kasia's issue. When viewing the employee handbook on this link: https://completeplumbingdrainage.com.au/employees/
you can enter details on desktop, but not mobile.

I also noticed the page: https://completeplumbingdrainage.com.au/employees/ wasn't displaying perfectly on iPhone 12 mini. Can you please check this out?
@chris the password is now "cpdstaff"
@ricaV2 can you please help me out with the PW reset?

Thanks heaps for the video Para, seems super easy.

Completely get it about the gov forms, employees can simply print them off.

I've tested the employee handbook and employee details form on pc and it works but on mobile it doesn't let me add info.

Can I be really annoying and ask for the password to be changed to cpdstaff

Lastly can I please get the invoice please 😊 unless you guys are waiting for this to be completed.

Thanks heaps all

Kasia

Hi Kasia, 

Thanks for your patience on this one. 

After looking into this further, the dev team informed me that we can only add signature fields to the forms we create. Unfortunately, the government forms aren't something we can include the signature forms on. While we are the first to automate any process we can, on this occasion the manual method remains. 

Here is a quick video that runs through the process of adding a new PDF form to the website: https://www.loom.com/share/0497857f62884c9f83f54223f1126a6c

@chris Those files are not created by us, so we can't modify them and add a digital signature like Kasia is requesting. We were able to add signatures to the ones that were created by Complete Plumbing, but not the government ones. We would need to completely rebuild them, which is not really an option I would assume. Can you please let Kasia know?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: Hi @ricaV2 and @heath can you please send the pdf InDesign file? I don't have the InDesign files for each pdf, I cant edit the settings for the signature field. Thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez
